dc_title_s: Petroleum Administration for Defense Districts (PADDS), United States, Winter 2016
dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents Petroleum Administration for Defense Districts in the United States. There are five PADDS, and each corresponds with a geographic region: East Coast, Midwest, Gulf Coast, Rocky Mountain, and West Coast. This layer is from Winter Quarter 2016. This layer is intended to assist users in locating and analyzing oil and gas basin data in the United States and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data. Hart Energy Publishing.(2016). Petroleum Administration for Defense Districts (PADDS), United States, Winter 2016. Hart Energy Publishing. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/wf520pt0911 This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
